## createStore() function

Create a Mutik `store` given some initial state. The `store` can be used in or out of React.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createStore<State>(initialState: State): Store<State>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  initialState | State | Initial store state |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Store](./mutik.store.md)<!-- -->&lt;State&gt;

Mutik store
